description:
Kousaka Makoto is an all-out otaku who joined Genshiken at the same time as Sasahara. He is a happy-go-lucky type who is mostly oblivious to the world around him.
Kousaka and his childhood friend Kasukabe both enroll at the university at the same time and become lovers shortly after the start of the story.
name: Kousaka Makoto
